comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
This fountain is known as "la Caja de Agua [water box] and is located in Calzada de Guadalupe and General Fuero in San Luís Potosí City (capital of the state of the same name), México.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
Plastic Surgeon

comment.author: 27541657@N07
comment._content: My wife and I always make the walk to the caja de agua and continue on to the Guadalupe church, almost yearly since 1997.  Beautiful old photo, but no longer a place to get water.  Today it is one of the many garden spots of San Luis Potosi.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
